name: Pittsburgh Policemen's Pension Fund Board, Appellant, v. Frey

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The order of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Duff.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

Pittsburgh Policemen’s Pension Fund Board, Appellant, v. Frey.
April 18, 1955:

Before Steen, C. J., Stearns, Jones, Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno and Arnold, JJ.
